Timeline
Current Projects, Education and Experience

  • Assisted with a Project

    I helped my friend with a project that involved more to do with extracting audio out of the video and converting it into text, later getting a summarized part of the text using NLTK and then reconverting the text back to audio. On the other side extracting the frames out of the video and deleting the repetitive frames. For longer videos the frequency of frames had to be changed so as to get minimum images with entire content.

    Aug 2020

  • Started studying at Stevens Institute of Technology, NJ

    After getting an experience from Jio for about 2 years I decided to pursue master's in Data Science as working on data gave me an enthusiasm to explore more.

    Aug 2019

  • Left Jio

    It was great adventure working at Jio for 2 years. I gained an exposure to the corporate culture and also increased my knowledge. I look ahead to joining a company where I can use my experience.

    June 2019

  • Working as a Data Engineer, Jio

    I worked on different projects that required me to create and plan flows, ingest data, and visualize the given data set. I designed data pipelines for Unique Identification number project, to insert data in Jio Big Data Lake using various processors and modified data on every stage with RegEx in a tool Apache NiFi. I actively took part to help build business requirement documents and plan deployments. Produced Jasper reports later utilized in Java application to generate dynamic content for Telecom Regulation of India project which improved the delivery of content by 30%.Also, I built data source for Jio Payments Bank project and constructed dashboards to derive useful information using Zoomdata - a tool specifically used for Big Data.

    July 2018

  • Started working as an Engineer Trainee, Jio

    Soon as I graduated I started working at Jio. There I performed User Acceptance Test on Jio applications against various test cases on IBM Rational Tool. I also detected bugs and exploited IBM Rational Tool for logging bugs.

    June 2017

  • Graduated with Bachelor's of Technology

    I graduated from Shreemati Nathibai Damodar Thackersey Women's University with 77%.

    June 2017

  • Started studying at Shreemati Nathibai Damodar Thackersey Women's University

    Along with studying I was active at participating in various committees and events. I was a Cabinet Member at SNDT ACM Students' Chapter. Also, an active member of ACM, IEEE, CSI, E-cell councils.

    July 2018
